alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 18 at 10:00PM CDT until May 18 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CARSON COUNTY... At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles north of Panhandle, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Carson County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
